rows.text: Alabama Administrative Office of Courts Museum Area
Exhibits of Alabama judicial history and important figures, located in the Alabama Judicial Building.

Open air museum that reenacts life in 1819.
Alabama Department of Archives and History
Official archives for the state of Alabama. Exhibits include Native American, military history, 19th and 20th century historic artifacts, photos, and art.
Official residence of Alabama's Governor. Open for tours.

Exhibits include a 1900s train and mining cars, one-room African American school, elementary school, post office, and depot. website
Displays illustrating the health sciences in the areas of education, research, and practice.
Displays of geology, zoology, mineralogy, paleontology, ethnology, history, and photography.
Exhibits illustrate how Alabamians have contributed to make the music industry what it is today.
